The `caret` package (short for **C**lassification **A**nd **RE**gression **T**raining) is a set of functions that attempt to streamline the process for creating predictive models. The package conatins tools for:

- data splitting
- pre-processing
- feature selection
- model tuning and resampling
- variable importance estimation

as well as other functionality.

The current release version can be found on [CRAN](http://cran.r-project.org/web/packages/caret/) and the project is hosted on [github](https://github.com/topepo/caret)
